attributes.action: Six Months Road Tax Should Cost No More Than Half Of Twelve Months Road Tax.
attributes.additional_details:
If you can only afford to tax your car for 6 months at a time it is wrong to be charged more than those who can afford to pay the full 12 months tax.
 Two payments for 6 months costs £236.50 compared to £215.00 for one payment for 12 months.
Six months tax should be the same charge per month as that for 12 months .
